    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the script, that is, send all messages that have to be sent and receives all messages that have to received.

        The outline of the algorithm is the following:

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • putMessage

        public void putMessage(communications.AbstractMessage message)
        Puts the message in the BlockingQueue of the run, taking care to check whether the message was at all expected. It will also learn the address of the sender, associating it with a role in the script, if no address is already set for it. Otherwise, if an address is already set, the message will be discarded.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be passed to the runner.
